video.name: VEGAN CREAMY ROASTED RED PEPPER PASTA | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
VEGAN CREAMY ROASTED RED PEPPER PASTA WITH BLACK PEPPER CHICKPEAS

Get the WRITTEN RECIPE here - https://www.veganricha.com/creamy-roasted-red-pepper-pasta-black-pepper-chickpeas/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

Creamy Roasted Red Pepper Pasta with Black Pepper Chickpeas. Elbows pasta in roasted red pepper sauce with crisp black pepper thyme Chickpeas and fresh Basil. Vegan Soy-free Recipe.

This pasta has a simple roasted red pepper sauce and pasta of choice. Topped with peppery herbed chickpeas and fresh basil, the flavors come together amazingly. Crisp up the chickpeas on a skillet or in an oven. Meanwhile, cook the pasta, blend up the sauce, combine and bring to a boil. Add veggies if you like. Serve loads of pasta with a good helping of the chickpeas. 

******MORE PASTA RECIPES FROM THE BLOG******

PUMPKIN SAGE PASTA WITH PUMPKIN CREAM SAUCE AND CRISPY SAGE: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-pumpkin-sage-pasta/

BLACK PEPPER MAC AND CHEESE WITH POTATO CARROT CHEESE SAUCE: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-black-pepper-mac-cheese-with-potato-carrot-cheese/

CHICKPEA CHORIZO, QUINOA SHELLS IN TOMATO SAUCE: https://www.veganricha.com/chickpea-chorizo-quinoa-shells-in/

COOKBOOKS BY RICHA HINGLE (VEGAN RICHA): https://www.veganricha.com/mybooks/

#veganpasta #pastarecipe #creamypasta #veganricha #easyveganrecipes

recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp freshly ground or coarsely crushed black pepper
1/4 cup cashews (soaked for 15 mins if needed)

itemListElement.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the chickpeas, spices, salt and herbs and toss well. Cook for 6 to 8 minutes until crisp on the edges. Stir occasionally. Taste in between to adjust salt and pepper. I like the chickpeas just lightly crisped on the stove top.
itemListElement.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the chickpeas, spices, salt and herbs and toss well. Cook for 6 to 8 minutes until crisp on the edges. Stir occasionally. Taste in between to adjust salt and pepper. I like the chickpeas just lightly crisped on the stove top.

itemListElement.text: You can also toss everything in a bowl with an additional 1 to 2 tsp oil and bake at 400 degrees F / 200ºc for 20 minutes or so until crisp.
itemListElement.name: You can also toss everything in a bowl with an additional 1 to 2 tsp oil and bake at 400 degrees F / 200ºc for 20 minutes or so until crisp.

itemListElement.text: Cook the pasta according to instructions.
itemListElement.name: Cook the pasta according to instructions.

itemListElement.text: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onions and garlic and cook until translucent.
itemListElement.name: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onions and garlic and cook until translucent.

itemListElement.text: Add half of the cooked onion garlic mixture to the blender. Add all the ingredients roasted red peppers through water and blend until smooth. Add to the skillet and bring to a boil. At this point you can add in some veggies(chopped small) if you like.
itemListElement.name: Add half of the cooked onion garlic mixture to the blender. Add all the ingredients roasted red peppers through water and blend until smooth. Add to the skillet and bring to a boil. At this point you can add in some veggies(chopped small) if you like.

itemListElement.text: Taste and adjust salt and heat. Add more salt, a pinch of sweetener if needed. I usually add in some more fresh black pepper to the sauce.
itemListElement.name: Taste and adjust salt and heat. Add more salt, a pinch of sweetener if needed. I usually add in some more fresh black pepper to the sauce.

itemListElement.text: Fold in the cooked pasta and cook for a minute. Cover and let sit for a few minutes.
itemListElement.name: Fold in the cooked pasta and cook for a minute. Cover and let sit for a few minutes.

itemListElement.text: Serve garnished with crisp peppery chickpeas and loads of fresh basil.
itemListElement.name: Serve garnished with crisp peppery chickpeas and loads of fresh basil.
